content: Peter Miller, Prospect CT. Awaiting opportunities to assist Team Harris.
Is there a physical location for a Harris-Walz HQ in CT?

This is just a reminder that you can sign up to phone bank, canvass, get trainings  or take other actions at https://events.democrats.org/ in your state or in one of our battleground states (NC, PA, GA, NH, WI, PA, MI, AZ, NV). Volunteers like you make all the difference! We look forward to seeing you at an event soon.
## [Connecticut Voter Information](https://www.vote.org/state/connecticut/)
Pinned a message.
Probably a bunch of local ones given how blue we vote federally
If you haven’t already, please check out * General Events: https://events.democrats.org/
It lists events in and around your area
Let’s go Connecticut—we have lots of purple areas with an influx of new residents. Let’s not be complacent 💙💙💙
If only I didn’t work weekends, I’d be canvassing for Jahana Hayes

Fellow CT voters! We may live in a solid blue state, but on election day we have a very important ballot measure.  In a nutshell, if it were to pass, it would authorize our state legislature to pass a law to allow anyone to request an absentee ballot
CT is actually purple
On the presidental level
Hasnt been red since 1988

Anyone else signed up for the Newtown Labor Day Parade this weekend with Sen. Murphy and Rep. Hayes? From the event wording, I’m not sure if they’re having us actually march with them or just watch from the side, but either way it should be fun! I remember marching with Team Murphy in 2012 and still have the t-shirt 💙
Ahhhhh I’m heading to nyc today or id be there
I believe you March with them

<a:star_wave:1269735420359606369> Hey, Team! We know you want to help make a difference! Did you know though that hosting a debate watch party is an amazing way to get involved and bring people together? <a:rainbow_heart_scribble:1269029739432120465> It’s all about good vibes, great conversations, and getting folks fired up for the election. Your watch party could be the spark that motivates someone to vote! <a:PinkFlames:1252802562659193004>  [Register your watch party](https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-debate-watch-party/event/create/) to get access to all sorts of resources for throwing a successful debate watch party, including a [Host Information Session](https://events.democrats.org/event/677337/). <a:ThanksRainbow:1278765693579431967>
Hey CT team, I've just set up a watch party. Are you able to also?
I’m not able to host this time but happy to help out with someone else’s or attend!
https://www.mobilize.us/voteriders/event/564817/?referring_vol=6684605&rname=Michael&share_context=event_details&share_medium=copy_link
Hi! Do any of you know if there's any volunteer opportunities happening soon over here soon?
In person volunteering? The candidates will be ramping up canvassing soon.
What exactly do you do for that?
Walk door to door and talk to voters.
Oh yeah, I'm good lol
We have a wide variety of volunteerism events: phone banks, relational events, online engagement, text banks, and more here...! https://events.democrats.org/?is_high_priority=true
Thanks for the link Michael!  Signed up for a shift!
the MAGA Attorney Generals are motivating me!
Nice! It's a great opportunity, I just started with them last week and am hooked. Will definitely keep volunteering for them well past this election.
Does it get busy?
You set your own hours , you can pull as many cases as you want to work on, mostly its helping people order their birth certificates first so they can then get an id etc... very flexible
I know that, it will probably pick up once we get closer
Hello hello!! Is everyone fired up after that epic debate?! If you're in the Danbury-Newtown-Redding area I have some extra signs from my watch party, if you're interested.
I am fired up!!! Greetings from Manchester, CT
I wish I were allowed to put up signs (HOA rules, sigh) but hello from Danbury, neighbor! 👋
Hey neighbor!!
I’m from Milford!  So hello my neighbors.  I get yard signs from the Democratic Party but that is for local elections.
Hello from Stratford
Hello new volunteers!! Do you have volunteering experience? How would you like to contribute?
I live in Trumbull!!
Let's get a volunteer wave going! Repond on a thread with how many events you signed up to! Let's make the goal 5+ https://www.mobilize.us/events/connecticut-volunteer-opportunities/
I would love to be able to do this for Harris - Walz. Where would the best state be? Pennsylvania? Is there an infrastructure for out of state volunteers?

Excellent. Please add the Pennsylvania channel. The process is the same in most states. Each city has a Democratic Party office. Contact them and the local reps to find out about their canvassing schedule. Also, search the event site by location. There are some canvassing opportunities listed. Please lmk how you do. https://events.democrats.org/
Hello!
From Milford Ct and proud to be a blue state and hoping we can keep it that way!!!
Hi. Alicia from Hartford. I’m sending get out the vote postcards for early voting in Michigan and voting reminders to new registered democrats in AZ.

I am at the Big E and I was at the Brooklyn fair last month.  Both places had vendors selling trump tshirts and other merch. Why don't we do that?
Do people volunteer for booths there? I wonder if there just wasn't any Democrats.
I think it would be local democrat committes who would table and sell items
I live in Manchester very close to Vernon line and they rented a space and have merch, flags, clothes and stuff. Very busy rd btw
I went to the democrat committee twice to finally get my Kamala/Walz sign
Is anyone hosting a Vice Presidental Debate watch party? I have some extra rally placards that I am happy to share.

Good evening fellow Connecticuters!  This November we have a chance to establish no excuse absentee voting!  Please click the link below to be informed of everything you need to know to cast your ballot! https://www.vote411.org/

Please pass the word along that early voting is now available in Connecticut. This is the first year it is in effect.

https://portal.ct.gov/sots/election-services/early-voting/early-voting
Remember, if you requested an absentee ballot, they will start to be shipped on Saturday
Want to join me for this event? https://mobilize.us/s/ncZVaj
Want to join me for this event? https://mobilize.us/s/NPgfUm

On this day 4 years ago, a record 3.3 million Americans cast their ballot early.  And as expected, only 1.7 million early votes have been cast (a 45% decrease).  Please use the link below or call the Democratic Voter Assistance Hotline 9am-9pm (EST) (1-833-336-8683) to request an absentee ballot, or make a plan to vote early or on election day.  https://iwillvote.com/
Get ready Connecticut!  Your ballots are in the mail!!
Want to join me for this event? https://mobilize.us/s/PNzBX2

<:mega2:1269006580976976076> A reminder that we have a dedicated ⁠https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1288163431911788586 Reddit channel where we coordinate our efforts to post campaign content, leave comments, and upvote <:kamala1:1269028302203523114> <:WalzSmile:1270424129853456445> -related posts. Right now even supportive subreddits like r/politics are bombarded with Trump info, and we're trying to change that. Let's help people find information about our candidates and the brighter future they offer! Head on over to our channel and we'll plug you in with opportunities to contribute. Even if you have just one minute to help, you can make a difference.
Get the role to see the Reddit channel, go to https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1260651617867399188 and pick the 👾

There are just 30 days left in this campaign.

30 days to fight for this country we love, to fight for the ideals we cherish, and to uphold the awesome responsibility that comes with the greatest privilege on Earth: The privilege and pride of being an American.

We must be worthy of this moment. That’s why today, I am asking for your help to contact voters in your community and ensure they are prepared to make their voices heard in this election.

Can we count on you to sign up to talk to key voters we need to reach before Election Day?
Want to join me for this event? https://mobilize.us/s/6Cs1xV

🚌 Looks like some canvassing trips to PA are popping up! I see departures from New Haven and Stamford so far  https://events.democrats.org/event/720771/

https://events.democrats.org/event/721423/
Hello! New person here. I could help via Facebook. Can someone give me info about doing so? Thanks.

Welcome Brian! We're glad to have you here! Hello and welcome! If you’re new to Discord, I highly recommend watching our Team Harris Discord Intro Video by Carolyn: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cA32MMsN61g to help you learn the new tech. Then I'd check out <#1268398483841220649>  and <#1268398608097476750> .  If you’re newer to volunteering, you could try our [**Volunteer Welcome**](https://events.democrats.org/event/671638/?utm_source=Discord&utm_medium=Posts&utm_campaign=Daily%20Engagement) to get an overview of different ways to get involved. If you feel like you are ready to go, you should try our [**Organize Your Friends and Family**](https://events.democrats.org/event/597621/?utm_source=Discord&utm_medium=Posts&utm_campaign=Daily%20Engagement) training. Meme and Misinformation Training could be really helpful on Facebook. 
[Meme Training](https://events.democrats.org/event/684758/)
Misinformation: How to Respond When Voters Repeat Online Lies
[Misinformation: How to Respond When Voters Repeat Online Lies](https://events.democrats.org/event/676496/)

I wanted to say hello to the other volunteers from CT. I have not been able to participate in any in-person events for the Harris/Walz campaign yet, so I haven't had the chance to meet other volunteers. If I didn't have to work today, I probably would have done the trip to PA. But I managed to get in a bunch of texts and calls after work. I've volunteered on other campaigns in the past but I'm not used to doing everything online. I hope everyone is well and I hope to meet you in person at some point. Glad to be part of the team.
Welcome <@432524570281639939>! You have been moving and shaking. Greatly appreciate you🙌

Want to join me for this event? https://mobilize.us/s/yCrvow

<:eyes:1252803301137842251>  Looking for more ways to get involved and get out the vote? **Join us Monday through Saturday for our GOTV Power Hours**, where you'll learn everything you need to know to reach out to your friends, family, and online communities and make sure they get out the vote! 🗳️ Sign up HERE: https://txt.democrats.org/GOTVHour

Wohoo! Early voting is finally in CT! Here’s info from our great SOS Stephanie Thomas—


Early Voting is IN-PERSON voting
It is available to every eligible voter
No special arrangements need to be made to use early voting

Voting begins Monday, Oct. 21 and ends Sunday, Nov. 3
This includes two SATURDAYS and SUNDAYS

Hours are 10am - 6pm all days except
Oct. 29 & 31 which have extended hours of 8am - 8pm

Every town has one location; Mansfield CT has two
It is NOT your usual polling location

See Early Voting link at MyVote.ct.gov for all details
NOTE: Nothing has changed about Election Day at your usual polling place from 6am - 8pm
Don’t forget about the no excuse absentee amendment!

In celebration of Kamala's birthday lets trade candles for calls and gifts for gumption! We're trying to reach over 3 million voters today! Can you help?  Knock out some calls while you are drinking your morning coffee and still be out in time to hit up a pumpkin patch!
